## ViewportBuilderOptions.mouseWheelEnabled property

Enable or disable mouse wheel scrolling (default: true).

**Signature:**

```typescript
mouseWheelEnabled?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

When enabled, the viewport responds to mouse wheel events for scrolling.
